channel.title: Need help creating server!
channel.description: Hey, I am trying to make a new server. I went to register and it said it is offline. How do I make it online?

item.title: Need help creating server!
item.dc:creator: @chaos_666 chaos 666
item.description:
@chaos_666 wrote:

Do you already have a server or just a client?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help creating server!
item.dc:creator: @Qbix Qbix
item.description:
@Qbix wrote:

If your running it locally for development, you don’t need to be port forwarded. Uhh, post more detail on what you want, might be able to assist.

For local,
Change the IP of the Client in whatever file it’s located in (Depends on base). If you know the IP, try running a search while in the main directory of the client, and you may be able to find it. Other than that, for the common bases, it’s usually in Client.java or GUI.java

After that, compile the client, run the server from the source folder, run the client and you should be able to connect.

Read full topic
